content.raw:
Hi Sven,

wow, this is a tricky one. I'll see what can be done. The ion type and charge are not related to the problem, it's just that the sequence cannot be parsed: it doesn't understand which one is the terminal group here: `'H-'` or `'-OH'`.

I'll see if this can be fixed in the general case.

As a workaround (don't know if it helps in your case): supplying `'H-H-OH'` or just `'H'` is equivalent.
content.html:
Hi Sven,

wow, this is a tricky one. I'll see what can be done. The ion type and charge are not related to the problem, it's just that the sequence cannot be parsed: it doesn't understand which one is the terminal group here: 'H-' or '-OH'.

I'll see if this can be fixed in the general case.

As a workaround (don't know if it helps in your case): supplying 'H-H-OH' or just 'H' is equivalent.
